description: Formation of a vehicular access to the front of the house incorporating the erection of a front wall
decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall begin not later than three years from the date of this decision.

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and specifications: [Unnumbered block plan, unnumbered location plan
Received: 12/02/2024
218northhydelane/2024/01, 218northhydelane/2024/02, 218northhydelane/2024/03
Received: 15/03/2024].

Condition : 3 - The vehicle crossover hereby permitted shall not be brought into use until the access and boundary wall have been constructed in accordance with the approved plans.  The development shall be retained as such thereafter.

Condition : 4 - Either side of the vehicle access hereby approved, visibility splay areas shown on the approved plans shall be provided before the access and parking area is brought into use.  These areas shall be kept clear of any obstructions to visibility greater than 600 mm in height, including shrubs, planting, boundary walls, fences, gates, other means of enclosure or other structures or objects at all times.
